title: `minimum` must not exceed `maximum`
description: Inclusive bounds are contradictory when minimum > maximum.

comprehensiveExamples.title: Wrong: minimum greater than maximum
comprehensiveExamples.description: Inclusive bounds must be coherent: minimum must be <= maximum.

comprehensiveExamples.title: Right: Equal inclusive bounds
comprehensiveExamples.description: Equal inclusive bounds are allowed; only exact value matches.

message: Adjust numeric limits or swap their values.
